name: Leaping Dodgem
description:
In this game you will enjoy high-speed races, be able to learn to shoot straight and jump in time, as well as test your ability to solve logic problems.

Leaping Dodgem is a bouncing electric car. The name Dodgem was not chosen by chance, as in many countries it is called electric cars in amusement parks, where children of all ages love to ride and push each other. But this innocent amusement car can turn into a disguised combat vehicle, on which you have to complete an important Mission.

For modern hybrid warfare, aggressive combat artificial intelligence (AI) was developed. But after the cessation of work on a secret, now abandoned base, the military forgot to turn it off, and now the AI is preparing to arrange an apocalypse for all living things.

Your mission is to destroy AI and save Humanity. You need to get to the Abandoned Base and be able to disable the AI, before it starts the attack. Only after completing all the levels and all the tests, you can complete the task assigned to you.

Your friend and helper is an unusual jumping Dodgem combat electric vehicle disguised as a civilian car from an amusement park. He can be equipped with the necessary means of protection and weapons to successfully complete the levels.

On the way to victory, many dangers await you, but nothing can stop a real hero! Complete all levels, prevent the uprising of cars under the leadership of the AI, earn a steep pilot rank and a lot of money!

For a detailed description of the threats, weapons and defense elements, see the tips in the game itself.

Fight with AI and prove that living intelligence is stronger than a soulless machine! May luck contribute to you! You are the hope of humanity!
